Alexandros Kourtis

Passionate about web development and solving problems

My name is Alexandros Kourtis, I'm 19 years old and my passion consists of building the web and developing software for the common good. Even though still a beginner, my focus is oriented around creating responsive, secure and functional websites. A handful of the work thatI have done is to be found here

Bank system

In this assignment I was required to build a Windows console application which will read various inputs from the keyboard. These inputs will be used as login details and actions in order to control the internal banking system of a cooperative company. Each input will be used for directing the various subsystems of this private banking system.

Check repository

The scoop

In this project I was given an empty file (server.js) and was told to add the functionality for it using Express.js. Specifically, I had to add the database information and server routes for comments and articles.

Check repository

Weather website

Climate change is upredictable? Everyday's temperature changes so drastically you can't catch up to it? Then, feel free to visit my weather website which collects data from the API at https://fcc-weather-api.glitch.me and according to the location in which are you are situated at it displays the degrees in Celsius and Fahrenheit.

Check repository

Food Bootcampers eshop

This was the capstone project of our team in CB3. It is a website which sells vegetables and dairy products. There are 3 user types. The client, who purchases the items. The member, who sells to the admin, and at last, the admin who manages the other users, processes the products for the clients to buy, confirms transactions and shares the money to the cooperation.

Check repository

Tic tac toe

Feeling nostalgic about one of the most timeless games in history, yet have no one to play it with? No problem! Now, you can renew the old memories and relive the simple pleasures of life against the TicTacToe AI.

Check repository

Snake game

If you are like me and can't seem to forget the joys that playing the snake game in the old phones gave you then you will love this version of it written in JavaScript.

Check repository
